definition: A unit of measurement commonly used to quantify the area of a two-dimensional space. It is often employed to describe the size of rooms, land, or other flat surfaces.

examples.german: Der Raum hat eine Fläche von 50 Quadratmetern.
examples.english: The room has an area of 50 square meters.
The apartment is 80 square meters in size.

examples.german: Das Grundstück hat eine Fläche von 5000 Quadratmetern.
examples.english: The plot of land has an area of 5000 square meters.
The kitchen is 10 square meters in size.

examples.german: Die Fläche des Gartens beträgt 200 Quadratmeter.
examples.english: The area of the garden is 200 square meters.
